meanings.definition: Having currents of cool air flowing in
meanings.sent1: The old house felt draftier after the window was left open.
meanings.sent2: The attic was draftier than the rest of the house.
meanings.sent3: The draftier room made the cat's fur stand on end.
meanings.sent4: The draftier hallway whispered secrets to those who passed through.
meanings.sent5: The draftier corner of the room was like a chilly embrace.

meanings.definition: More prone to drafts than something else
meanings.sent1: Her draftier coat let in more cold air than his thicker one.
meanings.sent2: The older windows were draftier than the new ones.
meanings.sent3: The draftier tent made camping an adventure in staying warm.
meanings.sent4: The draftier side of the room seemed to beckon the cold inside.
meanings.sent5: The draftier door creaked as the wind tried to sneak in.
